title: Google | L3 | Hyderabad
content:
Education : Teir 1 NIT
Years of Experience: 2 year 6 Months
Prior Compensation(Curr Year): 20 base + 5.5 bonus + 3L Stocks (28.5L for 1year)
Company: Amazon
Title: SDE I

Proposed Compensation - 
Location: Hyerabad
Base: INR 23.70 LPA
Signing Bonus: 5,00,000
Relocation Bonus: 1.2L - 1.5L
Stock bonus: 60000 USD over 4 years (38%, 32%, 18%, 12%)
Annual Bonus : 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR ~ 52 L (1st year)

Other Benefits
Medical insurance,
Internet reimbursement,
Free onsite food, snacks
Other standard benefits

Previously offered: 20 base, 75KUSD, 3L SignOn Bonus. Recruiter didn't negotiate, just changed the numbers keeping overall CTC almost same

Should I accept the offer or not ? Keeping in mind that I have upcoming promotion by June 2k24, although even after promotion compensation will be same as offered by Google ?

How much time does it take for promotion at Google ?


Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-question/4223067/google-interview-experience/2137101

title: Twilio | SDE2 (L3) | Remote (India)
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE Tier 3
Years of Experience: 5 (Purely product based companies)
Prior Experience: Few Fintech Giants (Currently on a career break)
Date of the Offer: Nov 2023
Company: Twilio
Title/Level: Software Engineer L3
Location: Complete Remote
Salary: INR 36L
Relocation: None
Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: $55K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 47 LPA
Benefits: As of now, its INR 4.5K per month for internet reimbursement and 10L medical insurance.
Other details: This is the initial offer, looking for some guidance from the community. Prior to my break, my comp was around INR 60 LPA.

Have other offers from EPAM (Client : Amazon) INR 50L, couple others also in pipeline. (Will post soon !)

Any guidane / suggestions / pointers are much appreciated for better negotiation, thanks in advance for help !
Please share insights on : Work life balance and work culture.
